name: Elma Casey
review: Very nice watch, comes packaged carefully and box it comes in is very chic and clean. Very happy with the purchase, my dad will be very happy on his birthday :)

name: Corina Phelps
review: Well the watch is definitely oversized. I couldn't find any photos on the internet so I was little bit surprised how it looks in real life. I couldn't imagine this watch on men because for me

name: Bernadette Rutledge
review: This is a nice watch, very sparkly and pretty. Would probably be better suited for a young woman.

name: Bradford Herring
review: Its a lovely watch. I bought this in a sale and didn't think I would reach much for it, but actually do quite often because it looks great on me. Surprisingly good fine.

name: Martina Larsen
review: These smartwatches branded as MK are fossil smartwatches under the skin. Dont expect a life beyond 2years or any repair from this watch in the future . I had one bought as a present

name: Toni Bentley
review: Very nice watch, the case looked really small when I first unboxed it but I think that was just because I was used to something bigger, after a day or so of wearing it I've got used to it and the size is perfect
